title: Trump Signs Order to Claim Power Over Independent Agencies
summary: Trump signed executive order "Ensuring Accountability for All Agencies" requiring independent agencies like FTC, SEC, and FCC to submit regulations for White House review, effectively ending 90 years of agency independence and bringing them under direct presidential control.
description: President Trump signed an executive order claiming direct control over traditionally independent federal agencies, undermining their ability to operate free from political interference.
